name: beastie
content:
beastie noun [C]
(INSECT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK informal an insect: Keep still, you've got a beastie in your hair.

General & informal words for animals
beastie noun [C]
(ANIMAL)
Scottish English or humorous an animal: A lot of beasties live in the forest. These otters are particularly vicious beasties, with very sharp teeth.
